``` class SayHelloController < ApplicationController def showFamily( aClass, msg ) if (aClass != nil) then msg += "
#{aClass}" showFamily( aClass.superclass, msg ) else render :text => msg end end def index showFamily( self.class, "Class Hierarchy of self..." ) end end ```

def self.up
    create_table :posts do |t|
        t.string :title
        t.text :body
        t.datetime :created_at

        t.timestamps
    end
end
